Screen
 

  • Uses of Screen in Screen

    Subclasses of Screen in Screen
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    InventoryScreen
    A screen where the tools of player is displayed The player can see and equip tools by clicking on the tool the mouse hovered over
    class 
    MenuScreen
    The starting screen where the player can start the game and go to the other screens.
    class 
    MineScreen
    The screen where the player is able to mine blocks Can get new tools when clicked on chest Can lose coins when clicked on bomb Can navigate to different screens
    class 
    NormalMine
    A normal mine that extends from MineScreen and that sets its unique characteristics
    class 
    RichMine
    A rich mine that extends from MineScreen and that sets its unique characteristics
    class 
    StatsScreen
    The screen that displays all of the achivements of the player Such as numbers of chest, blocks, and bombs cracked The number of tools obtained The number of coins that the player got
